chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
cei: candidate_entries_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
olpti: one_leader_per_term_interface
aecei: allEntries_candidate_entries_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface

Goal:
forall (A B : Type) (a : A) (b : B) (l : list (A * B)), In (a, b) l -> In b (map snd l)

Premises:
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.C
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (x : A), In x l -> In (f x) (map f l)
in_prod_aux : forall (A B : Type) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list B), In y l -> In (x, y) (map (fun y0 : B => (x, y0)) l)
snd_eq_not_in_map : forall (A B : Type) (l : list (A * B)) (n : A) (m : B), (forall nm : A * B, In nm l -> snd nm = m) -> ~ In (n, m) l -> ~ In n (map fst l)
map2snd = fun (A B : Type) (b : B) => map (fun a : A => (a, b)) : forall A B : Type, B -> list A -> list (A * B) Arguments map2snd {A B}%type_scope _ _%list_scope
map_fst_snd_id : forall (A B : Type) (l : list (A * B)), map (fun t : A * B => (fst t, snd t)) l = l
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l)
in_app_iff : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), In a (l ++ l') < -> In a l \/ In a l'
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
remove_all_cons : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ys : list A) (a : A) (l : list A), remove_all A_eq_dec ys (a :: l) = remove_all A_eq_dec ys l /\ In a ys \/ remove_all A_eq_dec ys (a :: l) = a :: remove_all A_eq_dec ys l /\ ~ In a ys
NoDup_cons : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l)
Inductive NoDup (A : Type) : list A -> Prop := NoDup_nil : NoDup [] | NoDup_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l) Arguments NoDup [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments NoDup_nil _%type_scope Arguments NoDup_cons [A]%type_scope _ [l]%list_scope
update_diff : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x : A) (v : B) (y : A), x <> y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = sigma y
update_fun_comm : forall (A B C : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (f : B -> C) (st : A -> B) (y : A) (v : B) (x : A), f (update A_eq_dec st y v x) = update A_eq_dec (fun x0 : A => f (st x0)) y (f v) x
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
update_eq : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x y : A) (v : B), x = y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = v
map_ext : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, map f l = map g l
map_id : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), map (fun x : A => x) l = l
in_dedup_was_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A) (x : A), In x (dedup A_eq_dec xs) -> In x xs
dedup_In : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), In x xs -> In x (dedup A_eq_dec xs)
Inductive prod (A B : Type) : Type := pair : A -> B -> A * B Arguments prod (_ _)%type_scope Arguments pair {A B}%type_scope
update_elections_data_clientRequest_allEntries_old : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (e : entry), In e (map snd (allEntries (fst st))) -> In e (map snd (allEntries (update_elections_data_client_request h st client id c)))
TotalMapSimulations.in_tot_map_name : forall (m : Net.msg) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (n : Net.name), (forall nm : Net.name * Net.msg, In nm l -> snd nm = m) -> In (n, TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_msg m) (map (fun nm : Net.name * Net.msg => (TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_name (fst nm), TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_msg (snd nm))) l) -> In (TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_name_inv n, m) l where ?base_fst : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface lsi : leader_sublog_interface olpti : one_leader_per_term_interface aecei : allEntries_candidate_entries_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface |-...
TotalMapSimulations.in_tot_map_msg : forall (m : Net.msg) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (n : Net.name), (forall nm : Net.name * Net.msg, In nm l -> snd nm = m) -> In (TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_name_inv n, m) l -> In (n, TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_msg m) (map (fun nm : Net.name * Net.msg => (TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_name (fst nm), TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_msg (snd nm))) l) where ?base_fst : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface lsi : leader_sublog_interface olpti : one_leader_per_term_interface aecei : allEntries_candidate_entries_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface |-...
TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_in_in : forall (n : Net.name) (m : Net.msg) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), (forall nm : Net.name * Net.msg, In nm l -> snd nm = m) -> ~ In (n, m) l -> ~ In (TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_name n, TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_msg m) (map (fun nm : Net.name * Net.msg => (TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_name (fst nm), TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_msg (snd nm))) l) where ?base_fst : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface lsi : leader_sublog_interface olpti : one_leader_per_term_interface aecei : allEntries_candidate_entries_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct...
update_elections_data_appendEntries_allEntries : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (t : term) (h' : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), In e (map snd (allEntries (update_elections_data_appendEntries h st t h' pli plt es ci))) -> In e (map snd (allEntries (fst st))) \/ In e es
TotalMapSimulations.msg_in_map : forall (m : Net.msg) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (n : Net.name) (m' : Net.msg), (forall nm : Net.name * Net.msg, In nm l -> snd nm = m) -> In (TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_name n, TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_msg m') (map (fun nm : Net.name * Net.msg => (TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_name (fst nm), TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_msg (snd nm))) l) -> TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_msg m' = TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_msg m where ?base_fst : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface lsi : leader_sublog_interface olpti : one_leader_per_term_interface aecei : all...
CommonTheorems.findAtIndex_elim : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e -> i = eIndex e /\ In e l
update_elections_data_clientRequest_allEntries_new : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (e : entry), In e (map snd (allEntries (update_elections_data_client_request h st client id c))) -> In e (map snd (allEntries (fst st))) \/ eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log (snd st))) /\ eTerm e = currentTerm (snd st) /\ type (snd st) = Leader
allEntries_leader_sublog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In e (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments allEntries_leader_sublog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
TotalMapSimulations.in_exclude_not_in_failed_map : forall (ns : list Net.name) (n : Net.name) (failed : list Net.name), In n (remove_all Net.name_eq_dec (map TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_name failed) ns) -> ~ In n (map TotalMapSimulations.tot_map_name failed) /\ In n ns where ?base_fst : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface lsi : leader_sublog_interface olpti : one_leader_per_term_interface aecei : allEntries_candidate_entries_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface |- BaseParams] ?base_snd : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface lsi...
